Praise for Dependent Relativity - Verses

Translated by Graham Woodhouse

Tsongkhapa (1357-1419) wrote Praise for Dependent Relativity on the morning that he first developed the wisdom realizing the final view, antidote to all the troubles of the world. The essence of this view is the harmony of dependent arising and emptiness.
